property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: U.S. and Pakistani counterparts in conversation

note.text: Pakistanis value honesty in their relationships. During engagements in both formal and informal settings, be as honest as operationally possible. Respond to conversation topics authentically, though within the boundaries of your expertise. Use a professional and diplomatic tone, even if you are in an uncomfortable position. Your counterparts will appreciate your integrity and willingness to be honest. It will show you take them seriously.
